sources.title: All Out for 'V' (1942)
sources.description: When war is announced, all the forest animals, birds and bugs go into manufacturing of armaments, helmets and the like, with an annoying jingle about the country's instruction to step up production musically repeated. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/all-out-for-v-1942/

metadata.Plot: When war is announced, all the forest animals, birds and bugs go into manufacturing of armaments, helmets and the like, with an annoying jingle about the country's instruction to step up production musically repeated.
metadata.Writer: John Foster, Isadore Klein, Tom Morrison
